鷝字的基本解释

鷝
bì
〔鷝鴋（
f乶g ）〕ａ．古书上说的一种青色白面的鸟。ｂ．传说中的水泽神。

鷝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
见“鷝鴋”。

鷝字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷝； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1499第21
【廣韻】必吉切【集韻】壁吉切，?音必。【廣韻】鷝鴋，鳥名。白面靑色。【山海經】作畢方。狀如鶴，一足赤文，靑質白喙。【集韻】一曰水澤神。

鷝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鷝字的起名意思

暂无。

鷝
Basic explanation of words
鷝
bì
〔鷝鴋(
f 乶g)] a. A cyan and white-faced bird mentioned in ancient books. b. The legendary god of water.
鷝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
See "鷝鴋".
鷝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷝; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1499 No. 21
[Guang Yun] Bi Ji cut [Ji Yun] Bi Ji cut, sound must be. [Guangyun] 鷝鴋, the name of the bird. White flour color. 【Shan Hai Jing】Complete the prescription. It looks like a crane with a red foot and a white beak. [Jiyun] One is the god of water and Ze.
